TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthenticatingEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks 创建一个处理程序<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>时想要自定义如何将用户的凭据进行身份验证在运行时事件。 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs>类提供任何值<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>事件处理程序。 通过使用此类中的可用属性，可以检索要自定义身份验证的用户凭据。
<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>类所引发<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>事件之前验证用户凭据。 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>类构造的实例<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs>对象，并将其传递给任何<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>事件处理程序。
可以使用<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>，<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A>和<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>属性来检索用户凭据。 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>属性可以包含其他值所需的身份验证，例如一个标识号。
<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>属性指示用户凭据是否有效。 您设置<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>属性设置为自定义身份验证的结果。 此外，设置<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>属性设置为`true`如果你已检查的用户凭据，并且不希望<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>类，以检查通过默认成员资格提供程序的用户凭据。
## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序将传递<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A>到自定义成员资格提供程序来验证用户凭据的值。 事件处理程序集<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>的返回值为<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>方法和集<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>到`true`以便<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>类不会验证凭据。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider/vb/Global.asax#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Authenticated { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Authenticated : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户凭据是否有效。
Docs.value: 如果用户凭据有效，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果身份验证中的事件处理程序的用户凭据<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>事件中，设置<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>属性以指示用户凭据是否有效。 如果用户凭据是否有效，并且需要进行任何其他验证设置<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>到`true`并<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>到`true`。 您设置<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>属性以指示身份验证服务应绕过默认对用户进行身份验证的步骤。 中的值<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>由<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>类才<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>设置为`true`。 如果<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>是`false`，则<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>类调用默认成员资格提供程序来验证用户凭据，则将覆盖中的值<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>。
## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序将传递<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A>到自定义成员资格提供程序来验证用户凭据的值。 事件处理程序集<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>的返回值为<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>方法和集<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>到`true`以便<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>类不会验证凭据。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider/vb/Global.asax#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AuthenticationIsComplete { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AuthenticationIsComplete : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户凭据是否已经过身份验证。
Docs.value: 如果执行了验证用户凭据的所有步骤，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 可以设置<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>属性以指示是否<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>类必须对用户凭据进行身份验证。 如果<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>是`true`，则<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>类不会验证通过默认成员资格提供程序的用户凭据。 相反，它使用中的值<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>以确定是否创建身份验证 cookie。
如果<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>是`false`，则<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>类验证通过默认成员资格提供程序的用户凭据，并将中的值覆盖<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>属性。
## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序将传递<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A>到自定义成员资格提供程序来验证用户凭据的值。 事件处理程序集<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>的返回值为<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>方法和集<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>到`true`以便<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>类不会验证凭据。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider/vb/Global.asax#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CustomCredential As String
public: property System::String ^ CustomCredential { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 获取用于身份验证的其他用户值。
Docs.value: 进行身份验证所需的除用户名和密码以外的其他值。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 可以使用<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>属性来检索用户名和密码以外的身份验证值<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>事件。 例如，应用程序可能会配置为验证标识号以及用户名和密码。 在这种情况下，将传入的标识号`CustomCredential`参数的<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>方法。 然后可以检索通过自定义值<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>属性。
<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>属性包含相同的格式中的自定义的值传递到<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>方法。 在中<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>事件处理程序，如果多个值存储在属性中，您必须分析的值<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>属性检索值。
## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>分析从两个身份验证值的事件<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>属性。 它将两个值的用户名和密码传递给一个名为的自定义身份验证类`StudentAuthentication`。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials/vb/Global.asax#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Password As String
public: property System::String ^ Password { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您使用<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A>属性检索的密码<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>事件。
## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序将传递<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A>到自定义成员资格提供程序来验证用户凭据的值。 事件处理程序集<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>的返回值为<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>方法和集<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>到`true`以便<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>类不会验证凭据。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider/vb/Global.asax#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserName As String
public: property System::String ^ UserName { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 为用户获取身份验证名称。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您使用<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>属性来检索期间的身份验证名称<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>事件。
## Examples 下面的示例显示了选择要使用成员资格提供程序的事件处理程序上的值基于<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>属性。 处理程序传递<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A>到自定义成员资格提供程序来验证用户凭据的值。 它会设置<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>的返回值为<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>方法和集<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>到`true`以便<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>类不会验证凭据。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider/vb/Global.asax#2)]
